functions.function_ast:
FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='lab_est_cases_adjacentes',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='case1',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    ArrayDecl(
                      dim_quals=[],
                      type=
                        TypeDecl(
                          declname='case1',
                          quals=[],
                          align=None,
                          type=
                            IdentifierType(
                              names=['int'],
                            )
                        )
                      dim=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='2',
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[1]=
                Decl(
                  name='case2',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    ArrayDecl(
                      dim_quals=[],
                      type=
                        TypeDecl(
                          declname='case2',
                          quals=[],
                          align=None,
                          type=
                            IdentifierType(
                              names=['int'],
                            )
                        )
                      dim=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='2',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='lab_est_cases_adjacentes',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='||',
              left=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='&&',
                  left=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case1',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='0',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case2',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='0',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  right=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        FuncCall(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='abs',
                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=
                                BinaryOp(
                                  op='-',
                                  left=
                                    ArrayRef(
                                      name=
                                        ID(
                                          name='case1',
                                        )
                                      subscript=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='1',
                                        )
                                    )
                                  right=
                                    ArrayRef(
                                      name=
                                        ID(
                                          name='case2',
                                        )
                                      subscript=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='1',
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='1',
                        )
                    )
                )
              right=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='&&',
                  left=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case1',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case2',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  right=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        FuncCall(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='abs',
                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=
                                BinaryOp(
                                  op='-',
                                  left=
                                    ArrayRef(
                                      name=
                                        ID(
                                          name='case1',
                                        )
                                      subscript=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='0',
                                        )
                                    )
                                  right=
                                    ArrayRef(
                                      name=
                                        ID(
                                          name='case2',
                                        )
                                      subscript=
                                        Constant(
                                          type='int',
                                          value='0',
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='1',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Return(
                  expr=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='1',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Return(
          expr=
            Constant(
              type='int',
              value='0',
            )
        )
    )
)
functions.question: Dans votre fonction "lab_est_cases_adjacentes", pouvez-vous expliquer la logique derrière votre condition IF, en particulier comment elle permet de déterminer si deux cases sont adjacentes?

              declname='selection_menu',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='laby_expert',
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Decl(
          name='saisie',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='saisie',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        If(
          cond=
            UnaryOp(
              op='!',
              expr=
                ID(
                  name='grille_chargee',
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"     1. Charger un labyrinthe\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[1]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"     2. [Indisponible] Resoudre le labyrinthe\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[2]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"     3. [Indisponible] Resoudre le labyrinthe pas-a-pas\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[3]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"     4. Quitter le programme\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[4]=
                DoWhile(
                  cond=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='&&',
                      left=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='!=',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='saisie',
                            )
                          right=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='!=',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='saisie',
                            )
                          right=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='4',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  stmt=
                    Compound(
                      block_items[0]=
                        FuncCall(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='printf',
                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=
                                Constant(
                                  type='string',
                                  value='"> "',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                      block_items[1]=
                        FuncCall(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='scanf',
                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=
                                Constant(
                                  type='string',
                                  value='" %i"',
                                )
                              exprs[1]=
                                UnaryOp(
                                  op='&',
                                  expr=
                                    ID(
                                      name='saisie',
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          iffalse=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"     1. Charger un labyrinthe\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[1]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"     2. Resoudre le labyrinthe\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[2]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"     3. Resoudre le labyrinthe pas-a-pas\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[3]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"     4. Quitter le programme\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[4]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"> "',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[5]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='scanf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"  %i"',
                        )
                      exprs[1]=
                        UnaryOp(
                          op='&',
                          expr=
                            ID(
                              name='saisie',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[3]=
        Return(
          expr=
            ID(
              name='saisie',
            )
        )
    )
)
